summary: A homesick, no-nonsense, lounge singer decides to leave New York City to spend some time visiting her two sisters and brother on the West Coast, and eventually falling in love with down-and-out ex-jazz pianist.
cast: Ida Lupino|Robert Alda|Andrea King|Martha Vickers|Bruce Bennett|Alan Hale|Dolores Moran|John Ridgely|Don McGuire|Warren Douglas|Craig Stevens|Tony Romano|Janet Barrett|Patricia Barry|Florence Bates|Monte Blue|Leonard Bremen|Nancy Brinckman|Barbara Brown|Eddie Bruce|Benny Burt|Jack Daley|Joe Devlin|Jimmie Dodd|Paula Drew|William Edmunds|Frank Ferguson|Eddie Fetherston|Patrick Griffin|Carl Harbaugh|Jane Harker|Sam Harris|Fred Kelsey|Peg La Centra|Frank Marlowe|David Marshall|Harold Miller|Ralph Montgomery|Jack Mower|Helen Pender|Ralph Peters|Tom Quinn|Robin Raymond|Suzanne Ridgway|John Sheridan|Larry Steers|Dorothy Vaughan|Sailor Vincent|John Vosper|Ben Welden|Jack Wise
title: The Man I Love
